name: AR Fighting Games 3D
description:
Very unique fantasy fighting game featuring 3D magical characters fighting zombie monsters in augmented reality.

AR Fighting Games 3D is a unique and fun augmented reality experience for mobile fighting games lovers.

Game Feature:
- Action-packed 3D augmented reality 3d arena fighting game
- Play with various colorful fantasy 3D characters.
- Bright and colorful character design.
- Use hand to hand martial art or massive powerful weapon strikes to defeat merciless zombie enemies.
- Augmented reality gameplay with easy to grasp touch screen mobile controls.

DOWNLOAD AR Fighting Games 3D NOW !!!
